title: You Make My Year, Riot.
body:
http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2015/48/1448314164-bard-penguins.jpg

http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2015/48/1448314815-bard-penguins-copie-2.jpg

http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2015/48/1448314958-bard-penguins-copie.jpg

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CUh5JWzUcAElYfZ.jpg

_... Poros dominated the World for 3 years..._

_But this year... A new race appeared._

_Take care of the Magical Journey... _

{{champion:432}}  **The Bard Boyz are Coming** {{champion:432}}

replies.body: What I want to know is if that's the chimes or the meeps
These are the Meeps! :D
Throwing penguins at people. I don't know how i feel about this.
They're not like normal penguins, they are Evil. Do not look their cutiness, it's all bait.
http://images6.fanpop.com/image/photos/35600000/Gunther-adventure-time-with-ice-king-and-gunter-35653376-584-576.jpg

Can't beat the classics.

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=M439EZKF,comment-id=000100010002000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-23T22:42:58.933+0000)

> Evil penguin, you say?
> 
> http://i.imgur.com/LdI40oS.gif

Omg.  Blast from the past right there, and I love you for posting that!
I'm pretty sure that's a chicken :P
http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m8demmuQko1qbencko6_500.gif
Next time you are watching, listen to Gunther. He says "wank". I am mature enough to find that funny.
https://media3.giphy.com/media/U4re1IqDamjh6/200_s.gif
YAY!!!!! I might actually get bard just to let penguins follow me around everywhere!
Ooooh boy, one more reason to buy the skin !
Just wait until you take a Magical Journey!~

I LOVE THIS SKIN. I have more incentive to max Bard, and it reminded me just why I loved him so <3
The Penguins though... oh god they're adorable... the backing... and the hot chocolate health packs... 
_Kreygasming intensifies_
Reminds me of high school and weedwick

I apologise to the Poro fans, but this year I just said to the team "Guys can we please take a break from Poros?"

RiotPenguin... it finally happened {{item:3151}}
Time for a new PVP mode:Poros vs Penguins

I would both love and hate that, love because we can play as poros/penguins against poros/penguins and lets face it, no one could resist that adorable fight, HOWEVER i don't want to see any poros or penguins die {{item:3070}}
But-but-but.... We can still ***kill*** the poros... Can't we?
That's what I was assuming. My friend asked me earlier why they picked penguins instead of poros and I said "Riot probably wants to take a break from poros because they're so overdone"

Are we just going to ignore that his healing shrines are mugs of hot cocoa?

Because that's pretty much the best thing ever.
And the cups slowwwwly rise up to touch a marshmallow...
Gunther, is that you?

I was almost gonna say "missed opportunity with no Santa Bard" but dang this skin is too adorable <3

Rito has melted my ice winter heart again :D

Lets be honest here.
How different would santa bard look from regular bard?
Wearing red. Thats about it.
I'm guna main bard now
it's gunther
Probably the cutest beastie to ever grace the Fields of Justice.
Pingu confrimed for League
NOOT NOOT
so hyped for this skin

I have mixed feeling about this skin, on the one hand ITS SO CUUUUUTE!

On the other it means an increase in the number of bad Bards upon its release...

Including me :^)

Still am waiting for the winter SR :'(

All of the current stuff planned is cool and all............but make a winter SR please RIOT!
FEATHERS MCGRAW!!!! Quick! Get a sentient dog and his owner to deal with it!
ITSSOCUTEGWEGRTWREWQREQWRE
everything changed wen the bard boyz attacked
